Saved Containers

Manage your saved containers. Containers cannot be inserted from the library window. The globe icon indicates the element is a global element.

    There are no custom containers in your library

Saved Columns

Manage your saved columns. Columns cannot be inserted from the library window and they must always go inside a container. The globe icon indicates the element is a global element.

    There are no custom columns in your library

Saved Elements

Manage your saved elements. Elements cannot be inserted from the library window and they must always go inside a column. The globe icon indicates the element is a global element.

    There are no custom elements in your library

Save Template

Save current page layout as a template

Enter a name for your template and click the Save button. This will save the entire page layout, page template from the page attributes box, custom CSS, and Avada Page Options. IMPORTANT: When loading a saved template through the "Replace All Content" option, everything will load, including the page template and Avada Page Options. When inserting above or below existing content only the saved content will be added.

  • contact us

      • Image Max Width

        • Toggle Description

        Set the maximum width the image should take up. Enter value including any valid CSS unit, ex: 200px. Leave empty to use full image width.

      • Image Sticky Max Width

        • Toggle Description

        Set the maximum width the image should take up when its parent container is sticky. Enter value including any valid CSS unit, ex: 200px. Leave empty to use full image width.

      • Style Color

        • Toggle Description
        • Global Options
        • Reset To Default

        Controls the style color for all style types except border. Hex colors will use a subtle auto added alpha level to produce a nice effect. Leave empty for default value of #000000. Reset to default.Using default value.

      • Element Visibility

        • Toggle Description

      • Element Sticky Visibility
